name: Adobe Commerce存在未明漏洞
product: ["Adobe Adobe Commerce 2.4.9-alpha1", "Adobe Adobe Commerce <=2.4.8-p1", "Adobe Adobe Commerce <=2.4.7-p6", "Adobe Adobe Commerce <=2.4.6-p11", "Adobe Adobe Commerce <=2.4.5-p13", "Adobe Adobe Commerce <=2.4.4-p14", "Adobe Adobe Commerce B2B 1.5.3-alpha1", "Adobe Adobe Commerce B2B <=1.5.2-p1", "Adobe Adobe Commerce B2B <=1.4.2-p6", "Adobe Adobe Commerce B2B <=1.3.5-p11", "Adobe Adobe Commerce B2B <=1.3.4-p13", "Adobe Adobe Commerce B2B <=1.3.3-p14", "Adobe Magento Open Source 2.4.9-alpha1", "Adobe Magento Open Source <=2.4.8-p1", "Adobe Magento Open Source <=2.4.7-p6", "Adobe Magento Open Source <=2.4.6-p11", "Adobe Magento Open Source <=2.4.5-p13"]
description: Adobe Commerce是美国奥多比（Adobe）公司的一种面向商家和品牌的全球领先的数字商务解决方案。Adobe Commerce存在安全漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致安全功能绕过。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/magento/apsb25-71.html
patch: Adobe Commerce存在未明漏洞的补丁
